services

Company saturno began its activity in the field of sale and purchase of vehicles in 2007 in Rostov-on-Don.

In practice, feeling its potential, we came to the conclusion that we can be useful to motorists in moscow and already in 2012 offered their services in the capital automobile market. Today we are implementing a wide range of programs: from traditional car purchase to europrotocol registration and trade in system

internet solution development

from custom websites designed in photoshop, and committed to html and a content management system, through to simple WordPress sites using customized templates, our web department has an extensive list of skills and techniques to share. Programming your websites and adding texts is by far not the end of our service. We will embellish your websites with the ability to hunt down a myriad business opportunities.
